./VulnMessage/Mail.pm

  • package VulnMessage::Mail
    • parse
  • EOF
   1 package VulnMessage::Mail;
   2 
   3 use 5.008;
   4 use strict;
   5 use warnings;
   6 use Carp;
   7 
   8 use Mail::Message;
   9 
  10 use base qw(VulnMessage);
  11 
  12 # create nice accessors -- i.e. <get> = $object->user -- <set> = $object->user($someuser)
  13 VulnMessage->mk_accessors( qw(msg) );
  14 
  15 sub parse {
  16     #In: RFC mail message
  17     #Do: separate into subject/body/raw msg
  18     #Out: VulnMessage::Mail object which is hash of {subject,body,msg} 
  19 
  20     #Init
  21     my $class = shift;
  22     my $msg = shift;
  23     my $self = $class->SUPER::new($msg);
  24 
  25     # Create Mail Object and get subject and body
  26     my $msg_obj = Mail::Message->read($self->{msg});
  27     $self->{body} = $msg_obj->body()->decoded;
  28     $self->{subject} = $msg_obj->subject();
  29 
  30     return $self;
  31 }
  32 
  33 
  34 
  35 1;
